info.description:
This document provides the documentation for the Market Intelligence API by Automata. Get your API Key at https://apis.byautomata.io and check out our Postman Collection.

The root API endpoint is https://api.byautomata.io. Please refer to the code samples for examples of how to call the Market Intelligence API. The ContentPro endpoints (/contentpro-search and /contentpro-similar-text) are not included in the standard Market Intelligence API plans. Please contact support@byautomata.io for access.
info.title: Automata Market Intelligence API

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Automata and other Market Intelligence products.

parameters.description: We provide information about related companies and articles based on the search terms you provide. Separate search terms with commas. Ex. https://api.byautomata.io/contentpro-search?terms=cloud+computing,enterprise,security
parameters.name: terms

link.description: Comma separated list of search terms. Ex. terms=cloud+computing,enterprise,security

400.description: Your request was not valid. Please refer to the API documentation https://api-specs.byautomata.io.

403.description: Invalid API Key. Please refer to the API documentation https://api-specs.byautomata.io.

501.description: There was a server error. Please try again later or contact support@byautomata.io

get.summary: Send search terms to receive the most relevant articles and companies.

x-code-samples.source:
curl --location --request GET 'https://api.byautomata.io/contentpro-search?terms=cloud+computing,enterprise,security' \
--header 'x-api-key: api-key'

wget --no-check-certificate --quiet \
  --method GET \
  --timeout=0 \
  --header 'x-api-key: 9OEDkaENEd2dzyF14fzcL73WQ5c8ifbX3waYbmhY' \
  'https://api.byautomata.io/contentpro-search?terms=cloud+computing,enterprise,security'
